response.overview: In this special New Year’s episode, Nobita wakes up too late and completely misses the countdown in Japan. Feeling miserable, he turns to Doraemon, who reveals that in Spain the New Year hasn’t arrived yet! The two travel to Madrid, where they dive into the festive streets, discover Spanish traditions, and even meet superstar footballer Takefusa Kubo.
response.title: New Year Eve in Spain
